changeDisplay: The display format for news has been changed.
modalCheckItText: The creation of my recruitment project has come to an end, resulting in this application ðŸ˜Š. At the same time, the most fun and the biggest difficulty were caused by my custom CSS styles. I largely decided to create my own layout. Of course, fully utilizing a UI library could have resulted in a better visual effect, but I chose to practice more advanced CSS, which is often overlooked in favor of diving into TypeScript (at least in my case). So, I used things like Transform, Transition, grid, as well as common ones like flex and @media.
